Let's import the SPSS file. 
```{r}
# load packages ---
pacman::p_load(tidyr, readr) 

# import data ---
# spss data from Jon
spss.dat <- read.spss("../data/JFF_LCA_ID.sav", to.data.frame=TRUE, use.value.labels = FALSE)

# csv data from Noman (late stage)
noman.dat <- read_csv("../data/Final_File.csv")

# save RDS ---
saveRDS(noman.dat, "../data/2018-1-17-final-file.rds") # final data from Noman
saveRDS(spss.dat, "../data/spss-from-john.RDS")
```
